## Service quality

- Monitor the quality of data services is a driver for improvement
- Create a monthly report with various statistics 

## Usage

- Aggregate and display access logs
- How are people using the services
- Which aspects are popular
- Which components have a bad performance

## Availability

- How often are our services available
- Receive a notification if a service is not available

## Complience

- Do services comply with the indicated standards (wms, wfs)

## Security incidents log

- Fraudulent email received
- Many requests from certain IP
- Low quality password detected
- Backup restored due to failing disk

## Search engine optimisation (SSO)

- Can users find our materials on Search Engines?
- Google/Bing offers a SSO Console where you can view crawling and usage statistics

## Tools

- Check local IT to understand which tools are offered
- [Geohealthcheck](https://geohealthcheck.org/) is a tool to check availability and complience
- [AWStats](https://awstats.sourceforge.io/) is a basic tool to evaluate access logs
- [pingdom](https://www.pingdom.com/) & [uptimerobot](https://uptimerobot.com/) are saas providers offering availability testing
